nodes.text: K-7R1 was a KX-series security droid manufactured by Arakyd Industries. Standing 2.16 meters tall, it had white sensors and black plating marked with white patterning. During the First Order's occupation of the planet Batuu in 34 ABY, the parts of K-7R1 were kept on display in the Droid Depot, a store located in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.

The security droid's headless torso was kept in a cage next to the 2-1B-series medical droid 2P-1 near the depot's counter, while its head sat separately on the floor of the cage. The author Eloc Throno included an image of a complete K-7R1 in the Droid Buyer's Guide section of his book, Traveler's Guide to Batuu.
K-7R1 appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
